posts.title: Monzo USA: We're here to support you with your money and your Monzo account during the coronavirus outbreak

description.text: If you are affected by coronavirus, it could also impact your income, your finances, and how you're able to manage your money. That's why we want to reassure you that we're well-equipped to support you and keep Monzo running

You can now move up the Monzo waitlist faster üöÄ
When you have an account, you'll have fee-free ATM withdrawals at 38,000 MoneyPass ATMs! üèß

posts.title: Introducing our transparent product roadmap - US

description.text:
We‚Äôre excited to say that we‚Äôre slowly starting to offer Monzo accounts to those on our US waitlist! üöÄ

To keep you updated every step of the way, we‚Äôre sharing our product roadmap and are asking for your feedback on what we should build next!

posts.title: Pots are here on Monzo Beta!

description.text:
Pots on Monzo are a way to help you budget and save for your goals üçØ
Pots can be used for many purposes: plan for a vacation, a big night out, or use a Pot to save for a rainy day ‚òîÔ∏è

All Monzo Beta cards are now contactless, so you can tap to pay üôå  
Save time at the store and, as always, get instant notifications when you tap.

Launching in the US is a big part of our mission to make money work for everyone üåè
You can keep up to date with everything we‚Äôve done, and plan to do next here on our brand new US blog.

posts.title: Monzo is launching in the USA!

description.text: Our mission is to make money work for everyone. And our next stop is the USA! üá∫üá∏
